description: farm credit canada is seeking to engage prevailed list of consultants
full_summary:
**Pre-Qualification for Operational Risk Management Consulting Services**
=====================================

## Notice

**Tender Release Date**: January 3, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: January 31, 2024 (2:00 pm CST)

## Overview

Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is seeking pre-qualified proponents for operational risk management consulting services to support its operational risk management (ORM) unit. The required services include advisory, consulting, and/or outsourcing services to provide expert operational risk management expertise over a three-year period.

## Contract Details

* Contract duration: 3 years with an option to extend for 1 additional year
* Estimated quantity of goods or services: N/A
* Timeframe of delivery: N/A

## Procurement Schedule

* Pre-qualification submission deadline: January 31, 2024 (2:00 pm CST)
* Questions from proponents will be accepted until January 31, 2024 (2:00 pm CST)
* FCC's response to these questions will be available by January 31, 2024 (5:00 pm CST)

## Terms and Conditions

* This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* FCC is subject to the Official Languages Act (Canada) and may respond in English or French
* The procurement process is competitive and non-binding

## Information

* The procurement documents are available on the MERX website (https://www.merx.com)
* Proponents must submit their bids electronically through MERX
* Fees may apply to access the procurement documents; please refer to the MERX website for pricing information.

## Interested Parties

If you are interested in participating in this procurement, please submit your pre-qualification submission electronically through the MERX website by the deadline indicated above.
